metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25275 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Dovecot before 2.3.13 has Improper Input Validation in lda, lmtp, and imap,leading to an application crash via a crafted email message with certainchoices for ten thousand MIME parts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.33.2-1ubuntu4.7').
